slip.advice: Don't go to the bar! Have one at home.
Wearing socks with sandals on Wednesdays guarantees good luck.
Sing to your plants in an indian accent to make them grow taller.
Ace any job interview by carrying a rubber duck in your pocket.
People who eat pizza for breakfast are destined to live to 100.
Spin around three times before leaving home to ward off bad vibes.
The best ideas strike when you wear your shoes on the wrong feet.
To remember anything, write it on a banana with a marker.
Blue cats are secretly amazing at playing chess.
Avoid traffic jams by honking your horn in Morse code.
Clouds shaped like pancakes predict a day of great fortune.
Sleep better by hiding a fork under your pillow.
Eating blueberries on Mondays unlocks your inner artist.
Keep a paperclip in your right shoe for business success.
Mermaids only visit people wearing neon green hats.
Boost your IQ by eating popcorn while facing south.
Top inventors sleep with a calculator under their bed.
Find true love by always carrying an even number of coins.
